Name: N-Toolbox
Description:
An H3VR mod that adds a miriad of wrist-menu buttons, sorted by functionality:
Item Interactions
Gather ItemsResert bear trapsFreeze/Unfreeze gunsFreeze ammoFreeze attacchmentsSpawn Ammo PanelSpawn ammo weenie
Player Interactions
Restore HP to fullRestore HP by 10% (currently bugged, restores full)Toggle 1-hitToggle god mode (invincibility)Kill yourselfToggle invisibility (currently broken)
Take and Hold Interactions
Note: These buttons only work correctly inside of a TnH run, and may produce undesireable results in other scenes
Add tokenSpawn ammo reloaderSpawn magazine duplicatorSpawn recyclerKill patrols
Scene Interactions
This is a set of buttons that will spawn you in the desired scene.Want to go to the TnH lobby? Simply click the button. Works betweenscenes.
ShortDescription: An H3VR mod that adds a miriad of wrist-menu buttons
